"Providing For Military Measures To Be Taken Upon The Apprehension Of Citizens Of the Philippines Who Voluntarily Have Given Aid, Comfort, And Sustenance To The Enemy"

metadata.title: Proclamation: Providing For Military Measures To Be Taken Upon The Apprehension Of Citizens Of the Philippines Who Voluntarily Have Given Aid, Comfort, And Sustenance To The Enemy
